# readarr_remote_path_mapping (Data Source)

## Schema

### Required

- `id` (Number) Remote Path Mapping ID.

### Read-Only

- `host` (String) Download Client host.
- `local_path` (String) Local path.
- `remote_path` (String) Download Client remote path.
